data.title: Amazing bakery
data.text: Being around the corner from Bennison, I forget sometimes how wonderful it is. How lucky to be nearby! Great baked goods--but also breakfast and lunch items like Han and cheese (or spinach and cheese) croissants. Good bread. And when the stomach is hungry and will is weak, sticky buns that are worth the calories. Yum.

data.title: A great bakery
data.text: When I first moved to Evanston I saw people lined up out the door to a store. Curious I went closer and discovered Bennisons. It's treasure in Evanston. I don't eat gluten but buy cookies here for a special dessert for company. I hear how wonderful their croissants are from visiting family. It smells wonderful in there so I enjoy it vicariously.

data.title: Well worth the calories
data.text: I usually skip the sweet treats because of calorie counting but here is where you throw away the app on your phone and treat yourself. Croissants, choc donuts, cookies, scones - and the bread is fantastic too.Everything is top quality and delicious so just be tempted and be sure you take home for later.

data.title: Yummalicious
data.text: Why are their chocolate cake donuts so good? Especially if you are lucky enough to get them when they are really really fresh? No oily aftertaste. No burping after--if ya know what I mean! And their almond croissants!!! Again...when slightly warm early in the morning! I could lose my mind! (But a mess to eat in the car!) Their breads are equally de-lish. And their cakes. Order early at holidays and you'll still wait in line cuz everybody loves this place. Nice to have an honest-to-goodness bakery with yummy products that aren't mass made and put on store shelves. YUM for Bennisons.

data.title: I love pastries
data.text: Oh my, was I nicely surprised. Very unassuming building, but fantastic pastries. Try the monkey bun, or pear tart, or anything else for that matter, you won't regret it.

data.title: Like a Kid in a Candy shop!
data.text: Such a wonderful family friendly bakery!  Everything looked so delicious that it was hard to choose  just one thing

data.title: Can get addicting!!
data.text: There are more than enough sweet selections that you could probably come back each day and have something new for weeks!  Their donuts are among the best and they also have cinnamon rolls, bear claws, turnovers and more.  Birthday cakes and tortes, as well as paczkis and king cakes.  If you are looking for a breakfast or lunch sandwich, you can also find that here, along with a variety of soft drinks and coffees.  My grandkids loved the minion cupcakes.  Reasonable prices and friendly service!

data.title: "B stands for BENNISON's is the BEST....Ever!'
data.text:
Morsels of fine, delicate sconces, rye breads, cinnamon raisin, glazed donuts, cream puffs, sugar cookies, the lightest-fluffiest EVER cakes imaginable...it's a WONDERLAND of exhilaration!

Particularly when I procure, admire and slowly consume the consummate CHOCOLATE ECLAIR....I'm unable to find mere words to describe it's deliciousness...suffice to say:  it's a palate pleaser.

Not once, in my over 55+ years of stopping in there have I EVER been disappointed.  If you want to experience a TASTE of HEAVEN on EARTH, try Bennison's, for they have garnered my highest  praise-worthy review.

=September Reese=

data.title: Nice little place
data.text: I have heard about this place before and wanted to take away some yummy bakes from here. Chocolate croissant that melts in the mouth & doughnuts that mean to be the definition of the food. Nice

data.title: Love, eat, bake!
data.text:
Crossing this bakery almost every morning is like paradise...
My first order was for a friend's birthday (now my husband) which I made online. Red velvet cake with topping of their award winning Macarons. Someone who avoids sweets finished almost whole 1.5 kg cake! Now i live pretty nearby and have had their cookies, macarons, pastries, cakes. There isn't one thing which I did not enjoy. A must try bakery for whatever you lay your eyes on.

data.title: Delicious local baked goods, award winning pastries and bread!
data.text: The coffee and donut line forms to the left! Order delicious pastries, cakes, sweet treats, cookies and breads at the other counter.  Bennison's is a community effort with many local kids having their first job experience behind the counter. Cakes are sweet and decadent. Don't miss the custard filled bismarks or coffee cakes. A highlight if visiting with kids is to stand outside the decoration station and view a master baker put the finishing touches on cakes!

data.title: Brownie delight....
data.text: I walked off the Metra and found this bakery that has that old time feeling. Wonderful brownies, took a box home. Donuts next time!

data.title: Real Bakery serving real food.
data.text:
Six grain bread started my experience while visiting family.
This spurred on sandwiches and desserts..Real butter, cream and flavorings used to perfection.

data.title: Great coffee and donuts
data.text: I went there looking for something simple, and discovered a charming bakery with great coffee. Try their raspberry filled donut.

data.title: Sans pareil
data.text: Not only the best bakery in Evanston, but perhaps in all of Chicago land.  Moreover, Bennison's won the Coupe du Monde de la Boulangerie, a world competition for artisan bakers held in Paris every 3 years!   Creative cake designs made to the customer's wishes, very friendly service, and open on all (or most) holidays.  Perhaps the only disadvantage is that the bakery is so popular that it is typically crowded; but service is reasonably quick.

data.title: Macaroons and coffee
data.text: Bennison's bakery was on my list of places to go in Evanston, after one trip we knew we'd be going back at least one more time, we actually visited their store 4 times in 3 days.  The coffee was great, I drink regular coffee, my husband drinks coffee drinks and enjoyed their mocha lattes. Their croissants are wonderful plain and as a breakfast sandwich. The macaroons are so light and flavorful!  Pistachio and salted caramel are two of our favorites.  Do yourself a favor and visit this bakery, it's delicious!

data.title: Worth the carbs
data.text: I love this great Evanston institution. The sheet cakes are especially good, as are the crumb cake slices (a steal at $1.25), the Bienstich (?) multi-layered cake with a crisp almond crust and light pastry cream, the carrot cake, and the napoleons. Cheap, delicious, has friendly service. What more could you ask for? Go!

data.title: Best bakery in town
data.text: Bennison has the most authentic croissants I've ever had.  Everything from there is good.  The fudge frosting on cakes is perfect!  All of their baked goods are fresh and tasty.  They also have delicious sandwiches for sale.  I love the Capresse.  If you want something specific, like muffins or croissants, go early.  Sometimes they sell out of some things.  However, there remains many choices of other things.

data.title: Kougnin Aman Say What?
data.text: French pastry with layers and layers of flaky buttery goodness. They have won awards for this pastry. I knew it had to be a great place as the lines were out the door.  Also had a few macaroons.....yikes those were deelish too!

data.title: Excellent baked goods....
data.text:
Hey Bennison.... I miss those chocolate sprinkle cookies...  All you ever have now are the sprinkles that are NOT chocolate....

Great place to order a cake for a party.... (we have done so)

Also... love the cinnamon donuts...
